job_tasks.phrase: Fine-tune AI/ML models to achieve the best response quality
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the process of adjusting and optimizing AI/ML models, which is a core aspect of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Build vehicle assistant response quality evaluation tools
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the development of tools, which falls under software development, likely to interact with or assess AI model outputs.

job_tasks.phrase: Build and improve data pipelines, dashboards, and other internal tools
job_tasks.justification: Building and maintaining tools, including data pipelines and dashboards, is a clear software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in reviews of requirements, technical design, and code
job_tasks.justification: Code and technical design reviews are integral parts of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain production systems including being on-call
job_tasks.justification: Developing and maintaining production systems, especially with on-call responsibilities, points to operational aspects of deploying and managing systems.

soft_skills.phrase: Build and improve data pipelines, dashboards, and other internal tools
Participate in reviews of requirements, technical design, and code

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes fine-tuning AI/ML models and building production systems, indicating a strong focus on model development and deployment. While there's mention of tools and pipelines, the core tasks lean towards the engineering of ML models rather than exclusively GenAI applications.
